sect1.title: Background
sect1.para:
To paraphrase William Shakespeare
"O! be some other name: What's in a name? that which we call a rose By any other name would smell as sweet" "What's in a name? That which we call a profile by any other name would mean the same". The problem is that the meaning of profile does not always mean the same thing; it is dependent upon the context in which it is used.
